task_1.name: Fix tag_event_proximity() schema error
task_1.root_cause: Field name mismatch: function returns nearest_event_id, trigger expected event_id

task_2.name: Backfill hypothesis_ledger for past events
task_2.finding: Past events CANNOT be backfilled - violates pre-commitment principle
task_2.current_state: 8 hypotheses exist for 8 upcoming events (100% forward coverage)
task_2.rationale: Hypotheses must be created BEFORE events to maintain learning integrity
task_2.implication: LVI will increase naturally as events complete
